name: Four Kings: Video Poker
description: Four Kings: Video Poker allows you to hone your poker skills - no extra chips needed! Now available from the creators of smash hit online casino game, "The Four Kings Casino and Slots" - Four Kings: Video Poker gives you the tools to be the top video poker player. Track your play with a full stats page, show off your biggest wins and try to beat the house! Get the royal treatment at The Four Kings.
